text: Anatoly Tankov (born 5 September 1941) is a Soviet equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Anatoly Tankov
